TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AlertHandler(Cocoa.Alert alert, int returnCode, IntPtr contextInfo);

Docs.param: The alert object that raised the event.
The return code indicating which button was clicked.
The contextInfo object that was specified.
Docs.summary: Defines the shape of methods that are called in response to an alertDidEnd event.

remarks.para: The method will be called as the result of clicking on a dialog button on an sheet.

The returnCode will be 1 (Default Button), 0 (Alternate Button), or -1 (Other Button) if you use the static method for instantiating the Alert. If you use the the returnCode value will start with 1000 for the first button added and increment by one for each new button.
